title: Heart of a Wolf
description: Follow along as Fynn, Nic, Jade and Fynn's cousin Mason uncover a human trafficking ring close to home. Will they release the captives? Will Mason listen to his wolf after 100 years alone and let his heart love again and make the woman he has fallen for his mate? Will Fynn finally show Nic her true feelings for him?  Find out in this exciting sequel to Absolving Evil - A Fynn Young Series.
author: Tracie Ann Riley Lester
